titles.title: Freeze on Bank Fees Act of 1995
To establish a freeze on bank fees for accounts held by average taxpayers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 3/23/1995--Introduced. Freeze on Bank Fees Act of 1995 - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to prohibit any insured depository institution from imposing any fee on the average non-corporate taxpayer account ($3,000 or less), for two years, for more than the amount imposed for such fee as of the date of enactment of this Act.
